Sentencas: The nickel based brazing alloys (BNi 2, BNi 4) modified by reactive TiH2 have been studied for their gas sealing properties of anode-supported tubular SOFCs to ferritic stainless steel by induction brazing process.
Titulo: Induction brazing for gas sealing of anode-supported tubular solid oxide fuel cells using the nickel based brazing alloy modified by TiH2

Sentencas: BNi 2 and BNi 4 are not wetted on YSZ electrolyte, but the brazing alloy with TiH2 showed good wettability with YSZ electrolytes due to a formation of TiOx layer.
Titulo: Induction brazing for gas sealing of anode-supported tubular solid oxide fuel cells using the nickel based brazing alloy modified by TiH2

Sentencas: Among the tested brazing alloys (BNi 2, BNi 4, modified BNi 2, modified BNi 4), all except modified BNi 4 did not join with YSZ.
Titulo: Induction brazing for gas sealing of anode-supported tubular solid oxide fuel cells using the nickel based brazing alloy modified by TiH2

Sentencas: The modified BNi 4 showed the lowest gas leak rate.
Titulo: Induction brazing for gas sealing of anode-supported tubular solid oxide fuel cells using the nickel based brazing alloy modified by TiH2

Sentencas: The gas tightness of a brazed cell was confirmed by open circuit voltage, which was nearly the same as a theoretical value.
Titulo: Induction brazing for gas sealing of anode-supported tubular solid oxide fuel cells using the nickel based brazing alloy modified by TiH2

Sentencas: Based on these experimental results, it is concluded that the BNi 4 modified by TiH2 is suitable as a sealing material in SOFCs operating at 750 degrees C. (C) 2010 Professor T. Nejat Veziroglu.
Titulo: Induction brazing for gas sealing of anode-supported tubular solid oxide fuel cells using the nickel based brazing alloy modified by TiH2
